attacks.name: Darkness Shield
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to each of your Active Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Cold Crush
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy card attached to Dark Golduck. If you do, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Night Ambush
attacks.text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Dark Golbat can't attack during your next turn. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Insomnia
ability.text: Drowzee can't be Asleep.

attacks.name: Soothing Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dig Drain
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Larvitar.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

ability.name: Knockout Gas
ability.text: If Koffing is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: Slugma does 10 damage to itself.

ability.name: Saturation
ability.text: When you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Wooper, remove all Special Conditions and 1 damage counter from Wooper."

cards.name: Copycat
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, count the number of cards in your opponent's hand and draw that many cards.
You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Pow! Hand Extension
text: Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. Or, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.
You may use this card only if you have more Prize cards left than your opponent.

cards.name: Rocket's Hideout
text: Each Pokémon with Dark or Rocket's in its name (both yours and your opponent's) gets +20 HP.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.

cards.name: Rocket's Poké Ball
text: Search your deck for a Pokémon with Dark in its name, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Venture Bomb
text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If tails, put 1 damage counter on 1 of your Pokémon.

ability.name: Froth
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you play Azumarill from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokémon, you may use this power. Each Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Azumarill. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Torchic Star.

attacks.name: Spring Back
attacks.text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sheer Cold
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Tonnage
attacks.text: You may do 60 damage plus 40 more damage. If you do, Piloswine does 30 damage to itself.

ability.name: Spiny
ability.text: If Qwilfish is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Qwilfish is Knocked Out), flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stun Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

ability.name: Evolutionary Light
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Dragonair is your Active Pokémon, you may search your deck for an Evolution card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Dragonair is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dark Streak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder Slash
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. Dark Flaaffy can't use Thunder Slash during your next turn.

ability.name: Methane Leak
ability.text: As long as Dark Weezing is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon that remains Poisoned between turns.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Darkness Charge
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on Dark Weezing.

attacks.name: Dump and Draw
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. Then, draw 2 cards for each Energy card you discarded.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Dense

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Headache

cards.name: Rocket's Mission
text: Discard a card from your hand. Then, draw 3 cards. If you discarded a Pokémon that has Dark or Rocket's in its name, draw 4 cards instead.
You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Rocket's Admin.
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player counts his or her Prize cards left and draws up to that many cards. (You draw your cards first.)
You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Surprise! Time Machine
text: Choose 1 of your Evolved Pokémon, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from it, and shuffle it into your deck (this counts as devolving that Pokémon). If that Pokémon remains in play, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon (this counts as evolving that Pokémon). Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: R Energy
text: Attach R Energy to a Pokémon that has Dark or Rocket's in its name. While in play, R Energy provides 2 Darkness Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.) If the Pokémon R Energy is attached to attacks the attack does 10 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). When your turn ends discard R Energy."

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Darkness Pokémon in play."
